entries.journal_entry_description: Destroy droids in the lower maintenance area, but avoid harming any security droids.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the hatch in the kitchen chamber to access the lower maintenance areas.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Destroy droids in this maintenance area, but do not harm the security droids. Doing so will set off an alarm and you'll need to leave before CorSec agents arrive.
